name: Scrapping Simulator
description:
Scrapping Simulator - is a First Person Simulator that promotes the act of dismantling and recycling Electronic Waste(eWaste). Your role in this simulator is to find eWaste and Junk that previous owners have thrown out or you can purchase scrap devices at the Pawn Shop, you can then Disassemble your collected eWaste, by doing this you will gather Raw Materials such as Copper, Silver, Gold etc you can either Sell your Raw Materials for a quick profit or you can Refine them and Forge them into Ingots for even more profit or sit on them to sell when the Market is high, you can also sell off unwanted Items at the Pawn Shop, as well as buy Upgrades/Quality of Life Purchases from the Hardware Store to grow your eWaste Management Business.

Join our Discord server to get amongst a great community:
https://discord.com/invite/Rw5qxNqfBT

Visit: https://DefectGaming.com for all the Latest News, Updates, Discounts, DEMO's, Road Map, Contact & Much More!

  • Explore the Town to Find and Collect eWaste and Junk that people have thrown out.
  • Hop on your Personal Computer to check current Market Prices, check emails, Track Active Deliveries, View Tips and Tricks, or Play some Games.
  • Disassemble eWaste taking everything off, down to the last Chip, PCB and Screw gathering their respective Raw Materials.
  • Sell Raw Metals to the Scrap Yard for a quick profit or wait until the metal is a better price to earn the most profit.
  • Visit the Pawn Shop to sell your unwanted eWaste or you can even buy some eWaste if there is not much on the streets.
  • Collect your metals and Smelt them into Ingots using the Furnace and Crucible for a larger profit or collect them and wait until the price is right or just keep them for bragging rights.
  • For more precious metals such as Gold and Silver you will use a Chemical Process to extract the Pure Gold/Silver.

The list of Fully Deconstruct-able eWaste objects is ever growing, each object is custom made to suit the Low Poly art style and to allow for some basic yet appealing designs while also keeping performance requirements as low as possible.
Some of the Fully Deconstruct-able eWaste Objects the game incudes is:

  • LCD TV
  • Personal Computer
  • Laptop
  • Microwave
  • DVD Player
  • Digital Video Recorder
  • Game Console
  • Server
  • Router
  • Hard Disk Drive
  • Video Card
  • Network Card
  • RAM Sticks (2,4,8,16 & 32GB with DDR3 & DDR4 Variants)
  • Power Supply Unit
  • And many more planned to come in future updates!

The list of Internal parts is also an ever growing list as more eWaste Items are added, some of the Internal Parts included in the game is:

  • IC Chips
  • BGA Chips
  • Crystal Oscillators
  • Transformers
  • Capacitors
  • CPUs
  • Screws
  • Heat Sinks
  • GPUs
  • HDDs
  • CD Drives
  • Power Boards and Motherboards
  • Much more and plenty to come in the future!
